thread.section_title: Munchery Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Munchery | www.munchery.com
thread.title: Corrine Robson

author: Corrine Robson
title: Corrine Robson
text:
I received Munchery as a gift certificate, not knowing anything about. I was thrilled with responses when I made requests about getting started. First delivery of checkered box went as promised. I loved putting on the apron after a hectic day at the office - transitioning into a fun cooking experience.
Really enjoyed trying new ingredients not found in regular market in Modesto and the food was delicious. Directions were very easy to follow and all ingredients were fresh. My husband liked the meals, too.
I highly recommend Munchery to lighten your day and expand cooking horizons.
